betaForm.whatDoYouDo:
In general, which roles do you play when creating applications?*
(Please, choose at least one option)

manifest.transformIdeas: Transform your ideas in powerful applications
manifest.theProject: Carbono.io allows you to build information systems like sites and apps for desktop, smartphones and other devices, using web standards and covering different levels of programming and designing skills.
manifest.democratizeDevelopment: Democratize the development of information technology
manifest.lowerBarriers: Reduce the barrier to application development
manifest.transformTheFuture: Contribute to the transformation of the future
